subject: RBC  Bank Capital Markets
body:
RBC  Bank Capital Markets
United States ; Head Office. 
200 Vesey Street, 
9th Floor New York, 
NY 10281 Â·
Dear,Sir/Ma
Please verify your current home address close to the bank where you will receive a Direct deposit to the bank once all is approved. 
Thanks,
Mrs Carolyn Carlson

subject: Re: RBC  Bank Capital Markets
body:
Hello Mrs Carolyn Carlson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really excited about this opportunity. However, I must apologize as I am not comfortable sharing my home address online due to privacy concerns. 

Could you please provide more details about the direct deposit process? How does it work exactly? And is there any other way to receive the deposit without providing my home address?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Marianne
